name: Crash Cars Retro LT
description:
Crash Cars is a two-dimensional maze racing game.

You control a car with no brakes which moves at either slow or fast speed through a maze containing dots.

At the same time, one AI controlled car runs through the same maze in the opposite direction with the intention of bump into your car.

At each of four junctions in the maze, you have the option of changing lanes to avoid the oncoming car.

The objective is to pick up all the dots before the enemy car takes you out.

Try to complete all levels!

Enjoy!
